entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:16 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 01:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 10:06 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:06 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
